dartScoreR: A Package for X01 Darts Game Scoring

dartScoreR-package.Rd

The dartScoreR package provides an R6 class-based system for playing and analyzing X01 darts games (301, 501, etc.). It handles score tracking, turn management, bust detection, and provides comprehensive game statistics.

Main Class

darts

The primary R6 class for managing a darts game

Utility Functions

parse_darts

Parse dart notation strings to scores

is_valid_dart_score

Validate dart scores

get_valid_dart_scores

Get all valid single-dart scores

get_checkout_doubles

Get all valid checkout doubles

max_turn_score

Get maximum possible turn score

Author

Maintainer: Jack Talboys jtalboys1@virginmedia.com
